title: Identify the Elements
text: Start by identifying all the elements involved in the reaction. Make a list of each element on both sides of the equation.

title: Count the Atoms
text: Count the number of atoms for each element on both sides of the equation. This will help you see which elements need balancing.

title: Balance Carbon Atoms
text: Start by balancing the carbon atoms. Adjust the coefficient of CO2 to match the number of carbon atoms in C8H18.

title: Balance Hydrogen Atoms
text: Next, balance the hydrogen atoms. Adjust the coefficient of H2O to match the number of hydrogen atoms in C8H18.

title: Balance Oxygen Atoms
text: Finally, balance the oxygen atoms. Adjust the coefficient of O2 to ensure the total number of oxygen atoms on both sides is equal.
